column5: What is the report on the spring sumo catfish run on the lower Red, and word? Ed "Backwater Eddy" Carlson "ED on the RED" ><,sUMo,>
According to Stu McKay of "Cats on the Red" at Lockport, MB, the catfishing has been very good in the Lockport/Selkirk area of the Red River. Google "Walleye Warrior"
